description:
As the Navy Admiral Ryokugyu comes to strike the Flower Capital, the Akazaya samurai notice and try to stop him, but his Woods-Woods Fruit power overwhelms them. Meanwhile, another formidable, yet friendly, guest approaches the Land of Wano
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt wird brennen! – Ein Marine-Admiral greift an!
Le monde brûle. L`assaut de l`amiral de la Marine !
Sekai ga Moeru! Kaigun Taishou Shuurai!
The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!
世界が燃える! 海軍大将襲来!
